Model comparison with Bayesian evidence¶

[Section in process…]

In this post we show how to perform model comparison between two models (\(\Lambda CDM\) and CPL) with Bayesian inference using the Bayesian evidence obtained by nested sampling.

\[P(D)=\int_{\mathbb{R}^N} P(D|\theta)P(\theta)d\theta,\]
